awards.name: Best Killer
awards.description: The fattest fragger of this war.

awards.name: Best Scooper
awards.description: They who hopefully had ClickLock enabled.

awards.name: Best Engineer
awards.description: Curving? Simultaneous placement? Pain? Piece of cake!

awards.name: Best Medic
awards.description: A shirt saved is a shirt earned.

awards.name: ECH Man Bad Award
awards.description: The model ECHman. The end justifies the means. - Hank Hill

awards.name: Touch Grass Award
awards.description: As Commandant, I cannot fully endorse nor encourage this medal. Unless you have a sun or grass allergy, please try to go outside. Walk the cat or something.
